hero.title: DiveFive — your smart dive log
hero.subtitle: iOS dive app that lets you record dives, import Apple Watch and UDDF data, map sites, and track stats.

benefits.title: Log your dives
benefits.description: Keep a secure, organized record of every dive.

benefits.title: Explore new sites
benefits.description: Interactive maps to plan and discover locations.

benefits.title: Share with the community
benefits.description: Connect with other divers and share your adventures.

featureSection.title: Your digital buddy underwater
featureSection.description: DiveFive turns every dive into insights you can relive, analyze, and share.

items.title: Register your dives
items.description: Depth, time, gear and notes — logged in seconds.

items.title: Import from Apple Watch
items.description: Sync HealthKit data for accurate, automatic records.

items.title: Map your favorite sites
items.description: Pin dive spots, review conditions and plan with confidence.

items.title: Analyze & improve
items.description: Spot patterns in your dives and grow as a diver.

steps.title: How it works
steps.description: Three simple steps to turn every dive into insight.

content.empty: Screenshots will appear here once you add them.
